title: Bolʹshoĭ Petropavlovskiĭ burial ground
description: Burial complex along a stretch of over 3 km of the northern bank of the Siniukha River, a stream in the Laba River valley (Krasnodar region). The necropolis contains over 200 individual burials dated to the Middle Bronze-Early Iron Ages (3rd millennium BCE-3rd century CE).

properties.description: Point representing the approximate centerpoint of the visible remains at Bolʹshoĭ Petropavlovskiĭ, after Гей 2018.
properties.title: Imagery location of Bolʹshoĭ Petropavlovskiĭ site
